Posted By: DarthParallax (10/30/2011 3:12:36 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I love her as an EDH commander. Giving her double strike and paying 6 mana gives a lot of saprolings each turn. That may be a lot to pay [Ashnod's Altar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ashnod's Altar) makes it a whole lot easier; suddenly you'll have more than enough colourless mana to use for whatever you choose.   
 Even without the Altar, 8 mana for a [double cleave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=double cleave) and her ability activated twice is a nasty surprise in a combat phase.
posts.html:
I love her as an EDH commander. Giving her double strike and paying 6 mana gives a lot of saprolings each turn. That may be a lot to pay Ashnod's Altar makes it a whole lot easier; suddenly you'll have more than enough colourless mana to use for whatever you choose.
Even without the Altar, 8 mana for a double cleave and her ability activated twice is a nasty surprise in a combat phase.
